verses.name: Luke 22:64
verses.text: And when they had blindfolded him, they struck him on the face, and asked him, saying, Prophesy, who is it that smote thee?

verses.name: Luke 22:65
verses.text: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him.

verses.name: Luke 22:66
verses.text: And as soon as it was day, the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together, and led him into their council, saying,

verses.name: Luke 22:67
verses.text: Art thou the Christ? tell us. And he said unto them, If I tell you, ye will not believe:

verses.name: Luke 22:68
verses.text: And if I also ask you, ye will not answer me, nor let me go.
